title: Copi
description: Copi is a full-stack minimalist blogsite application that I built from scratch, where users can read, post, edit, and delete their coffee-related stories.

title: Living Word
description: An interactive Bible verse web app showcasing React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS, designed to provide daily motivation and comfort through God's Word.

title: My Portfolio
description: A portfolio site built with Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS to showcase my work and experience.
